task: The task is to move the pink plastic cup to the center of the table without knocking over any other cups.
description: The initial state shows three white paper cups stacked together on the right side of the table, with one pink plastic cup on the left side. The final state shows the pink plastic cup moved to the center of the table, with the white paper cups still stacked on the right side.
plan: 1. **Pick up the pink plastic cup** from the left side of the table. 2. **Move the pink plastic cup to the center of the table** without knocking over any other cups.
planning_reason: To achieve the task, the robot needs to pick up the pink plastic cup and place it in the center of the table. This requires careful positioning to avoid knocking over the white paper cups. The robot should focus on lifting the pink cup gently and moving it to the desired location.
